attributes.title: ✨🧚 Not a supporter of racist Cheetos 🧚✨
attributes.review:
It all started when I got this app 🙀but then I opened my phone and there was a big orange Cheeto on it 🟠 nothing but a big disappointment 😡😥😔  I was truly scared for my life😱😥 I had nightmares about it since then The End. 

🧚✨ Btw instead of worrying about an app worry about the global pandemic that is happening in our country right now ✨🧚 #savebarron2020 

ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆

attributes.title: Trouble operating
attributes.review: I’ve tried multiple times to use this app to support our GREAT president but it seems to lag for an extremely long time. It won’t let me click any icons and it keeps loading whenever I open it up to use. This is one of the worst apps I have ever downloaded and it’s sad to say but if a president can’t even make a functioning app, what does that day about him as a president? Thanks

attributes.title: I can’t believe this is an official app! Sooo bad!
attributes.review: When I was a child I dreamed of an app representing our country’s leader in a great and respectful manner however every time I open the app it glitches and makes my phone overheat with rage probably from the outrage that I would even download such an app onto it. My childhood dream has been utterly crushed by this app and I just hope my dear mother doesn’t find this or it will surely kill her.

attributes.title: Don’t get the app
attributes.review: This app is ridiculous it makes my phone glitch it was so much I don’t want to hear it was reasons why to basically vote for Donald Trump againNobody like he’s orange self my phone was glitching like crazy like I don’t understand I got off theThe app then it kept glitching then I had to turn my phone all the way off then turn it back on it was still glitching so bad and so many ads like oh my goodness

attributes.title: Bunker boy 🧚🏾‍♂️🧚🏾🧚🏾🧚🏾‍♂️
attributes.review: I cannot express my disappointment that he was even  allowed one term in the White House🧚🏾‍♂️❤️. Racists, misogynistic, communist ideals and propagated information provided both from his mouth and through this APP🥰😍💅🏾.      🧚🏾🧚🏾‍♂️😊😃✌🏾.                                                       ”Donald Trump is a white supremacist, full stop If you vote for him again you're a white supremacist, full stop America can be better but we must call it out 'til it full stop” -Daveed Diggs

attributes.title: It broke my new iPhone 11 Pro!! 😭
attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app, I was jumping out of my set while downloading but then right when I got on my phone just started to glitch like crazy and my phone started to get really hot so I was scared to touch it, and a minute later my phone completely shut off and now it does work, I’m crying and I’m super upset. I had the 11 pro, welll not any more. Your not get my vote any more

attributes.title: Disgusting app no❤️
attributes.review: This app just brings viruses plus i was like yeah sure let’s support the president but then i was like well he’s racist✨, homophobic🧚🏻‍♀️, sexualizes his own kids😍 and is a disgusting person🙈. so do i really want him as as my president🤮 how bout no❤️, also he has killed😔 many people 😭 for his own good😍 like this man 🧔🏼has hurt 😢this country✨ so much🧚🏻‍♀️ that most people🧟‍♀️ dislike him💋 so this is a horrible🙈 app and also gives viruses 🦋

attributes.title: Do not download this app at all!
attributes.review: I originally downloaded this app to stay up to date about the Greatest President ever. As soon as I got on Donald TRUMP ONLYFANS POPED UP. I don’t know who controls this app but my poor Christian eyes were deceived. I immediately started screaming out bibles verses Jobs 5:14-22 to be exact. Now I’m bathing in holy water asking the good lord to forgive me for my sins. Do not and I repeat Do not download this app if you love Jesus as much as I do. God bless America, and to jail trump goes.

attributes.title: Donald Trump is a white supremacist. Full stop.
attributes.review:
There is no reason DJT should be president and this app is propaganda. He has now made America great again, in fact, all he’s done is show the world how terrible we actually are. 

He’s worse than a child. He’s most definitely a drug addict (it takes one to know one.) He’s inept, dull, a narcissist, and a fraud. 

Apple shouldn’t have this app available for download as they are now associated with white supremacy.

attributes.title: Donald Trump needs to go to hell
attributes.review: So anyways first off he’s a misogynist and he is extremely homophobic and he’s obviously racist and he wants to have send with his daughter acting like it’s normal and trump supporters won’t see that they literally hate on everyone other thing not everything is plain and I was in shock when I found out there were black trump supporters like he don’t even like you thank you for your time
